sect2.title: Dépendances
sect2.para: Groff-&groff-depversion; nécessite que les programmes suivants soient installés:
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib Bison: bison Diffutils: cmp Fileutils: chmod, cp, install, ln, ls, mkdir, mv, rm, touch Gcc: cc1, cc1plus, collect2, cpp0, g++, gcc Grep: egrep, grep Make: make Gawk: awk Sed: sed Sh-utils: basename, date, echo, expr, hostname, uname Textutils: cat, tr
